alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 8:08PM EDT until March 26 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MERIWETHER AND SOUTHERN TROUP COUNTIES... At 808 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Cannonville to near Big Springs to Durand, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Greenville, Mountville, Cannonville, Odessadale, Abbottsford, Stovall, Piedmont Heights, Big Springs, Durand, Harris City, Smiths Crossroad and Long Cane. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
